casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Anthony Paul LOCRICCHIO. No. D-2943. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 7, 2016.

Anthony Paul Locricchio, of Kailua, Hawaii, is suspended from the practice of law *461in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
